hero.description: I am a software engineer with a primary focus on back-end development. I have solid experience building scalable and distributed services using Golang and Node.js, applying microservices, messaging (Kafka, SQS), and relational and NoSQL databases. I also have knowledge of front-end development with React and Next.js, but my main expertise is back-end, ensuring performance and resilience.

about-me.title: About Me
about-me.description1: Software Engineer specialized in back-end, with experience in scalable, distributed, and high-performance systems. I mainly work with Golang and Node.js, but I also have knowledge of front-end with React and Next.js.
about-me.description2: In back-end, I have built robust APIs, microservices, and messaging pipelines using Kafka and SQS. I have strong experience with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Aurora) and NoSQL databases (DynamoDB, MongoDB, Redis). I apply software engineering best practices such as SOLID, Clean Code, and Design Patterns.
about-me.description3: In addition to back-end, I have complementary experience in DevOps practices, using CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS services to support scalability and availability.

description.react: Experience with React and Next.js for building modern interfaces, supporting full-stack projects.
description.go: Primary language for back-end and high-performance microservices development, with excellent concurrency support.
description.javascript: Core web development language, used in both front-end and back-end.
description.typescript: Static typing to improve safety and scalability in Node.js and front-end projects.
description.nextjs: React framework with SSR/SSG, used in front-end support projects.
description.nodejs: Essential runtime for scalable back-end, REST APIs, and distributed integrations.
description.aws_lambda: Serverless execution on AWS for scalable applications.
description.amazon_s3: Scalable and secure object storage for files and static content.
description.dynamodb: AWS NoSQL database, optimized for scalability and low latency.
description.postgresql: Reliable and robust relational database, with strong support for complex queries.
description.mysql: Widely used relational database for web applications, with support for transactions and high consistency.
description.redis: In-memory database for caching, queues, and sessions, improving performance.
description.rust: High-performance and memory-safe language, used in critical systems.
description.python: Versatile language for automation, data analysis, and service support.
description.kafka: Distributed messaging platform for real-time event processing.
description.docker: Essential tool for containerization and environment standardization.
description.kubernetes: Container orchestration for high availability and scalability.

events.title: Bachelor’s Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
events.description: Completed my degree at the Catholic University of Brasília.
specification: • Agile methodologies such as Scrum.
• Database fundamentals.
• Algorithms and Data Structures.
• Object-Oriented Programming.
• Software Engineering and best practices.

events.title: Software Engineer - Rizzo Dev
events.description: Worked as a full-stack developer, mainly focused on back-end with some front-end support.
specification: • Back-end development with Node.js and MySQL.
• Created services in Golang for data analysis.
• Used Redis for caching and optimization.
• Built CI/CD pipelines.
• Web scraping and large-scale data analysis.
• Supported front-end development with React and Next.js.

events.title: Software Engineer - Inside Code
events.description: Main focus on back-end, developing scalable and distributed services.
specification: • Built services and APIs with Golang and Node.js.
• Implemented messaging with Kafka and SQS.
• Database modeling and microservice integrations.
• Created CI/CD pipelines and deployment automation.
• Used Docker and Kubernetes to standardize environments.
• AWS infrastructure (Lambda, API Gateway, EC2, S3, VPC, CloudFront).

events.title: Postgraduate - MBA in Full Cycle Architecture
events.description: Advanced studies in software architecture and distributed systems.
specification: • Distributed and scalable architectures.
• Microservices and event-driven architecture.
• DevOps and CI/CD.
• Cloud and high availability strategies.
• Security and best practices in modern applications.
